data.eml:eml: On a new Antarctic species of Symplectoscyphus Marktanner-Turneretscher, 1890 (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa, Sertulariidae), with an annotated checklist of the Antarctic species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peña, Álvaro L. (2010): On a new Antarctic species of Symplectoscyphus Marktanner-Turneretscher, 1890 (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa, Sertulariidae), with an annotated checklist of the Antarctic species of the genus. Zootaxa 2494: 29-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195709
